name: Ext_R3_DiagnosticReport_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.DiagnosticReport.context for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticReport.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReport|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Health care event when test ordered
element.definition: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) which this DiagnosticReport per is about.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.context` maps to R4 `DiagnosticReport.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.
